Class Phrase

All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable, org.hs.util.Copy, Decaf, GExpression, at.dms.compiler.PhylumListener, com.bitwise.decaf.editor.ReferenceListener, com.bitwise.decaf.editor.ScopeReference, Serializable, Typed, Utils.Renderable
public class Phrase
extends Grammar
implements GExpression, Typed

Phrase is a transparent wrapper for a GExpression, holding its place in the code tree and providing a generic interface by which the editor can interact with it. Its type defaults to Utils.noType, and null tolerance is a virtue in this class. An external entity may notify a Phrase that it is expecting a certain type to be in its place, via setExpectedType(Type); if the Phrase's content implements TypeChameleon, TypeChameleon.applyType(Type) will be called with the expected type.

See Also:
Serialized Form

static interface Phrase.TypeChameleon
          Instances of Grammar.Content may additionally implement TypeChameleon if their content can be converted to other (most often primitive) types.

Constructor Detail

Phrase

public Phrase(com.bitwise.decaf.editor.grammar.CodeNode parent)
Construct a phrase with the provided parent node in the code tree. Initializes this.content to null and this.expectedType to Utils.noType.

Get the type of the implementing construct.

Specified by:
getType in interface Typed
Returns:
the type of this Phrase's content, or Utils.noType if this Phrase is currently empty.

isClassReference

public boolean isClassReference()
Returns:
true if this.content instanceof ClassReference (in which case accessed members will be static).

setData

public void setData(Object o)
set this.content with the data provided as o by the following rules:

1) if o is a Phrase, take its content
2) if o implements Grammar.Content, take o
3) if o is null, set content to null
4) no other forms of o are acceptable: throw an IllegalArgumentException asking what the object is (by classname, as class is the criterium)

Specified by:
setData in class Grammar

setExpectedType

public void setExpectedType(com.bitwise.decaf.editor.Type type)
Set the expected type of this Phrase. If this.content implements TypeChameleon, apply the new expected type to it.
